subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|水|alt1=氵|t1=water|烕|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc}} – to destroy with water (extinguish, flood).

subSections.title: Etymology
Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[obliterate]]; to [[wipe out]]; to [[eradicate]]; to [[conquer]]
# to be [[destroyed]]; to [[perish]]; to [[die]]
# to [[disappear]]; to [[vanish]]
# to [[extinguish]] (a fire); {{lb|zh|of light or fire}} to [[go out]]
# to [[turn off]] (light, lamp, etc.)
# to [[alter]] (handwriting)
